intent_atoms.description: Run the lenient-versus-strict benchmark on macOS hardware with Combine enabled using the 1 GiB fixture
Archive the printed runtime and RSS metrics under Documentation/Performance/ alongside the existing 32 MiB results

functional_units.name: Run lenient-versus-strict benchmark
functional_units.description: Execute the performance benchmark comparing lenient and strict modes on macOS hardware using Combine framework

functional_units.name: Export payload size environment variable
functional_units.description: Set ISOINSPECTOR_BENCHMARK_PAYLOAD_BYTES to 1 GiB for the benchmark run

functional_units.name: Archive runtime and RSS metrics
functional_units.description: Store printed runtime and RSS metrics in Documentation/Performance/ alongside existing 32 MiB results
